title: Neither Side
rules: This card has no icons at all, so the text should stretch edge to edge.

title: Left Only
rules: This card has a few left icons, so the text should shift to the right to accommodate it.

title: Right Only
rules: This card has a few right icons, so the text should shift to the left to accommodate it.

title: Both Sides
rules: This card has a few icons on each side, so the text should compress itself to fit between both rows.
